title: Veigars E got nerfed because
body:
Having an instant AOE stun that can lock down an entire team isn't exactly balanced.

Why haven't we nerfed Annie who can do the exact same thing, except easier and more often?

1. Because Annie's stun requires an ultimate, and more often than not Flash as well.
2. Because Veigar's can stun longer
3. Because Veigar's can also be used as a zoning tool.
4. Lastly,  and perhaps most importantly, because they perform two very different roles.

1. Her stun does not require an ultimate.  She can stun off of every ability except her E.  You most likely see it with her ultimate because that's how you get the most damage out of it.
2. Veigar's stun also does zero damage.  It also has a 1.25 second channel time.  Annie's is instantaneous, and she can proc it many more times due to the reset on her Q.
3. You really don't think a flaming bear that does burst AOE damage and DOT while auto attacking you is a zoning tool?  I'm not even talking about her W right now.
4. UWOTM8?  They fill the exact same roles!  They're both burst AP casters that use their stuns as utility in teamfights while doing disgusting amounts of damage to single targets.  Only difference is that when Veigar did it he got nerfed, and it took months of Annie support cheesing before she even got tapped.  She still is bullshit to this day.
